verses.verse: In the third <WH7969> year <WH8141> of Cyrus <WH3566> king <WH4428> of Persia <WH6539> a thing <WH1697> was revealed <WH1540> unto Daniel <WH1840>, whose name <WH8034> was called <WH7121> Belteshazzar <WH1095>; and the thing <WH1697> was true <WH571>, but the time appointed <WH6635> was long <WH1419>: and he understood <WH995> the thing <WH1697>, and had understanding <WH998> of the vision <WH4758>.
In those days <WH3117> I Daniel <WH1840> was mourning <WH56> three <WH7969> full <WH3117> weeks <WH7620>.

I ate <WH398> no pleasant <WH2532> bread <WH3899>, neither came <WH935> flesh <WH1320> nor wine <WH3196> in my mouth <WH6310>, neither did I anoint <WH5480> myself at all <WH5480>, until three <WH7969> whole <WH3117> weeks <WH7620> were fulfilled <WH4390>.
And in the four <WH702> and twentieth <WH6242> day <WH3117> of the first <WH7223> month <WH2320>, as I was by the side <WH3027> of the great <WH1419> river <WH5104>, which is Hiddekel <WH2313>;

Then I lifted up <WH5375> my eyes <WH5869>, and looked <WH7200>, and behold a certain <WH259> man <WH376> clothed <WH3847> in linen <WH906>, whose body <WH4975> was girded <WH2296> with fine gold <WH3800> of Uphaz <WH210>:

His body <WH1472> also was like beryl <WH8658>, and his face <WH6440> as the appearance <WH4758> of lightning <WH1300>, and his eyes <WH5869> as lamps <WH3940> of fire <WH784>, and his arms <WH2220> and his feet <WH4772> like in color <WH5869> to polished <WH7044> brass <WH5178>, and the voice <WH6963> of his words <WH1697> like the voice <WH6963> of a multitude <WH1995>.

And I Daniel <WH1840> alone saw <WH7200> the vision <WH4759>: for the men <WH582> that were with me saw <WH7200> not the vision <WH4759>; but <WH61> a great <WH1419> quaking <WH2731> fell <WH5307> upon them <WH1272>, so that they fled to hide themselves <WH2244>.

Therefore I was left alone <WH7604>, and saw <WH7200> this great <WH1419> vision <WH4759>, and there remained <WH7604> no strength <WH3581> in me <WH1935>: for my comeliness was turned <WH2015> in me into corruption <WH4889>, and I retained <WH6113> no strength <WH3581>.

Yet heard <WH8085> I the voice <WH6963> of his words <WH1697>: and when I heard <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of his words <WH1697>, then was I in a deep sleep <WH7290> on my face <WH6440>, and my face <WH6440> toward the ground <WH776>.
And <WH3027>, behold, a hand touched <WH5060> me <WH5128>, which set me upon my knees <WH1290> and upon the palms <WH3709> of my hands <WH3027>.

And he said <WH559> unto me <WH1840>, O Daniel, a man <WH376> greatly beloved <WH2532>, understand <WH995> the words <WH1697> that I speak <WH1696> unto you <WH5975>, and stand upright <WH5977>: for unto you am I now sent <WH7971>. And when he had spoken <WH1696> this word <WH1697> unto me <WH5975>, I stood trembling <WH7460>.

Then said <WH559> he unto me <WH3372>, Fear not <WH1840>, Daniel: for from the first <WH7223> day <WH3117> that you did set <WH5414> your heart <WH3820> to understand <WH995>, and to chasten <WH6031> yourself before <WH6440> your God <WH430>, your words <WH1697> were heard <WH8085>, and I am come <WH935> for your words <WH1697>.

But the prince <WH8269> of the kingdom <WH4438> of Persia <WH6539> withstood <WH5975> me one <WH259> and twenty <WH6242> days <WH3117>: but <WH4317>, behold, Michael, one <WH259> of the chief <WH7223> princes <WH8269>, came <WH935> to help <WH5826> me <WH3498>; and I remained there with <WH681> the kings <WH4428> of Persia <WH6539>.
Now I am come <WH935> to make you understand <WH995> what shall happen to <WH7136> your people <WH5971> in the latter <WH319> days <WH3117>: for yet the vision <WH2377> is for many days <WH3117>.
And when he had spoken <WH1696> such words <WH1697> unto me <WH5414>, I set my face <WH6440> toward the ground <WH776>, and I became mute <WH481>.

And <WH1823>, behold, one like the likeness of the sons <WH1121> of men <WH120> touched <WH5060> my lips <WH8193>: then I opened <WH6605> my mouth <WH6310>, and spoke <WH1696>, and said <WH559> unto him that stood <WH5975> before me <WH113>, O my lord, by the vision <WH4759> my sorrows <WH6735> are turned <WH2015> upon me <WH6113>, and I have retained no strength <WH3581>.

For how <WH1963> can <WH3201> the servant <WH5650> of this my lord <WH113> talk <WH1696> with this my lord <WH113>? for as for me <WH6258>, directly there remained <WH5975> no strength <WH3581> in me <WH5397>, neither is there breath left in me <WH7604>.
Then there came again <WH3254> and touched <WH5060> me one like the appearance <WH4758> of a man <WH120>, and he strengthened me <WH2388>,

And said <WH559>, O man <WH376> greatly beloved <WH2532>, fear <WH3372> not <WH7965>: peace be unto you <WH2388>, be strong, Yes <WH2388>, be strong. And when he had spoken <WH1696> unto me <WH2388>, I was strengthened, and said <WH559>, Let my lord <WH113> speak <WH1696>; for you have strengthened me <WH2388>.

Then said <WH559> he <WH3045>, Know you therefore I come <WH935> unto you <WH7725>? and now will I return to fight <WH3898> with the prince <WH8269> of Persia <WH6539>: and when I am gone forth <WH3318>, behold <WH8269>, the prince of Grecia <WH3120> shall come <WH935>.

But <WH61> I will show <WH5046> you that which is noted <WH7559> in the scripture <WH3791> of truth <WH571>: and there is none <WH259> that holds <WH2388> with me in these things <WH4317>, but Michael your prince <WH8269>.
